DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Defined Administrative Activity Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field to define the response for administrative.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._An activity defined at a global library level that is not directly related to hypothesis evaluation or testing, but is typically essential to the efficient and/or effective coordination and execution of a study.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.

Property.preferredDefinition: An activity defined at a global library level that is not directly related to hypothesis evaluation or testing, but is typically essential to the efficient and/or effective coordination and execution of a study.

Concepts.definition: An activity defined at a global library level that is not directly related to hypothesis evaluation or testing, but is typically essential to the efficient and/or effective coordination and execution of a study.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
